website_summaries.verdict: A traditional gun cabinet that beautifully displays and locks your guns safely.
pros: A nice piece of furniture for your home
Has a lock on the display case
Includes locked storage underneath the gun display case
cons: Inconsistent quality can lead to a finished item that doesn’t look as good as pictured

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece but very first piece on assembly list was not drilled for pegs. Has to call and they did quickly get ship a proper piece. All in all would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: nice looking for the price paid, fairly easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: not bad for the price, the back was damaged in shipping, a call to the manufacturer (distributer) was fast and friendly and new parts showed up in less than a week, after assembly the cabinet looks nice but needs mounting to the wall. The nice beveled glass door is very heavy and the cabinet will fall forward if not attached to the wall, directions were ok but left out a few steps, but it went together quickly with tools supplied and your own Phillips screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: Rwgems

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: We had seen some of the earlier reviews that spoke of the cabinet's damage when it arrived. Then the most recent reviews seemed better, so we thought the company had fixed their problem. However, when we unpacked our cabinet, it had FIVE deep chunks taken out of the wood. It is such a shame......it could have been a beautiful cabinet. Is it functional? Yes. Is it flawed? Yes. Hopefully, at some point the company will listen to these reviews and provide a non-damaged product.
customer_reviews.author: Cherylynn MacGregor

customer_reviews.title: budget gun cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how they did this damaging to the door when it was in the middle of the box (see pictures). The Felt Lining is not glued on well. It is not Easy to Assemble, the instructions are badly written. It is not Solid Wood some of it is pressed broad. The Door is hard to level so that it won't rub on the bottom. Oh and if you have guns with only a 16 inch barrel like an M4 or AR the top of the barrel will only come up to the wood shelf. But if you are on a budget then this is an Ok gun cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Not all the parts are made of real wood. When I got the item in. It had a huge Crack going all the way down 1 board. A chipped piece of wood out of the door and one of the hinges were bent. Send back for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Michael t.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Mine also arrived broken, the L shaped edges of the sides lower cabinet we snapped off (both sides). I had to glue them back on but was able to assemble the cabinet with no problems afterwards. Not bad once you get it together.
customer_reviews.author: James Huynh

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together and as others have stated the ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as scheduled. It was easy to put together and as others have stated the glass is very heavy. We anchored it to the wall in two places with different anchors than what came with it. The back was a little messed up but the company was great in sending a replacement quickly. It met my needs great.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The picture of this gun cabinet makes it appear much nicer than it actually is. The materials are cheap (all particle board), it dents easily and most, if not all of the pieces were damaged when it arrived. Thankfully, none of the damage was too extensive and was remedied with scratch remover. In addition, it takes two people to assemble and is somewhat top heavy. If you're looking for a nice gun cabinet, you may want to consider looking at another product.
customer_reviews.author: Eagle Mountain Powersports

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband. I put it together myself and it was very easy to assemble. He is very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Ninjo!

customer_reviews.title: A good looking cabinet that is worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: A well built case that holds everything I had scattered across my desk! The bottom section is NOT drawers. It's a false front that hinges down for much easier access to the entire space. Great place to store ammo to keep the cabinet from getting top heavy. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: ebschor

customer_reviews.title: THE ITEM WAS SHIPPED IN A POOR CONDITION, BANGED UP PACKAGE
customer_reviews.text: THE ITEM WAS SHIPPED IN A POOR CONDITION, BANGED UP PACKAGE , WITH DAMAGE TO INSIDE ITEM = CHIPPED EDGES OF CABINET, HAD POORLY GLUED BROKEN EDGE OF A DOOR . WAS IT USED, OR BAD RETURN SOLD AGAIN? UNACCEPTABLE CONDITION, NOT DEEP ENOUGH TO ACCOMODATE RIFLES WITH PISTOLE HANDLE, i.e. AR 15 IT LOOKS STURDY, BUT IT IS NOT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Same as in the pictures and descriptions
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. But the back is a little to thin.
customer_reviews.author: Osher Netkin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gun cabinet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble. Only had one issue and that was where some of the wood around the front bottom door had been damaged. but with a little stain it covered right up.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Stratton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cabinet but required hours to assemble it. Easily holds double barrel shotguns and rifles with scope.
customer_reviews.text: Would have rated it 5 star if assembly had not taken so long, It required a second person to attach the glass door. Looks very nice though and is in excellent condition. An outstanding value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kent and Jolene

customer_reviews.title: The door had 5 scratches which needed to be colored ...
customer_reviews.text: The door had 5 scratches which needed to be colored in with a repair kit from Home Depot. The door is heavy and when opened makes the cabinet top heavy. 50 lbs of barbell plates in the bottom worked for me, Suits my purpose for corner of bedroom but not in a living room/ den.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Texan

customer_reviews.title: This is a winner
customer_reviews.text: This box was beat up but the product appears to not have any damage. Easy to put together with clear directions.
customer_reviews.author: sisterpine

customer_reviews.title: cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I needed a gun cabinet that I could lock and store some ammunition. This cabinet also has a nice classic look to it and it wasnt hard to assemble, i would recommend this
customer_reviews.author: steven kempter

customer_reviews.title: instructions for installation easy and impact immediate
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by this display cabinet. The wood is solid, instructions for installation easy and impact immediate.
customer_reviews.author: RobertNCamille

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! Sent the first one back for replacement....Sent the replacement back as well!!
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: We had to send first one received because of damage ...
customer_reviews.text: We had to send first one received because of damage. Received second one and had 2 of same side piece. Both taken care of but a hassle. I expected more than what I receive - disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: wanda stoltzfus

customer_reviews.title: It was purchased as a gift so I was not happy when I received it
customer_reviews.text: Received it late. The wood was also damaged in multiple places. It was purchased as a gift so I was not happy when I received it, not only late, but also damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Y.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GUN CABINET
customer_reviews.text: I WAS WORRIED WHEN I READ THE REVIEWS FOR THIS GUN CABINET, SO I DID DEBATE FOR AWHILE BUT FINALLY SAID WHY NOT IT WAS A GOOD PRICE. SO I PURCHASED IT AND WAS VERY HAPPY. MY 18 YEAR OLD SON LOVES IT AND PUT IT TOGETHER IN TWO HOURS, NO DAMAGE WHEN BOX ARRIVED.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lookiing
customer_reviews.text: After getting over the initial shock that this came in a box it was fine. It is very pretty when put together and not very hard to put together. Gave this as a gift to my husband and he really likes it. It is a very pretty color.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Freer

customer_reviews.title: with a fine finish. Altogether a handsome room addition
customer_reviews.text: If the cabinet did not have two nicks on the front sides, about mid-way, lock height, I would have given the product 5 stars. It is solid, well made, with a fine finish. Altogether a handsome room addition.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This took 2 days to put together. Now that it is assembled, I am enjoying it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie

customer_reviews.title: We had trouble with the lock on the door they ...
customer_reviews.text: We had trouble with the lock on the door they need to make sure that there is enough room for the bolt that holds the lock other than that it's a really nice
customer_reviews.author: kristina ann headleu

customer_reviews.title: It was damaged in shipping and pieces of the wood ...
customer_reviews.text: It was damaged in shipping and pieces of the wood on the front in about 4 places had broken off. It is cheaply made which made it difficult to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, solid and easy to assemble. Assembly time about 3 hours. Very good quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph B.

customer_reviews.title: Gun cabnit
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? I love it and it was so easy to assemble. I glued it as I assembled it so I never will take it apart. It was completely finished and looked like it was bought assembled as a finished cabinet from an expensive store.Very well built!
customer_reviews.author: Mr R Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great! Very easy to install and very nice looking. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni C.

customer_reviews.title: very nice cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cabinet but seemed to be hard for my husband to put together. A lot of different pieces and one had the wrong number on it but he figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Pretty useless to have a gun cabinet with no lock
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with gun lock as it was supposed to. Pretty useless to have a gun cabinet with no lock.
customer_reviews.author: Eboni Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product-Read instrucions carefully
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet was purchased for our home. The most important piece of advice for anyone who purchases this cabinet is to read over the instructions before begining the project. There are lots of small parts and you need to use the shims where indicated. Other than that great piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Jo Lester

customer_reviews.title: issue
customer_reviews.text: Cabinet was not all wood, poorly ingineered cabinet leans forward when door open almost tips forward I will need to modify problem by adding heavier wood to back side and balancing out weight
customer_reviews.author: demetrio g deleon

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet is very difficult to assemble. We had trouble getting the glass door to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Just plan awful
customer_reviews.text: This looks great in the picture, but assembling it was a nightmare, and the end result is awful. Nothing was plume, and the door barely opens without scratching the cabinet. It is a true piece of junk!
customer_reviews.author: P. Suciu

customer_reviews.title: Ok quality.
customer_reviews.text: Back piece was broken while being delivered. It took 2 1/2 weeks to get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: brute48

customer_reviews.title: Gun Rack
customer_reviews.text: The Gun Rack was a nice piece of furnature and also works well with the guns.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce W.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful gun cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful gun cabinet. It did arrive with a broken piece, but my husband was able to glue it and fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Hall

customer_reviews.title: Nice cabinet
customer_reviews.text: It had a dent in the wood on the left front panel. To much hassle to send it back. Would of liked a light in the top, we added that.
customer_reviews.author: darla jones

customer_reviews.title: Nice cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet was much nicer than I expected. It took 3 hours to assemble. One piece was damaged when received but it was the backing for the bottom storage compartment so it doesn't show. I didn't bother trying to contact for another piece of backing.
customer_reviews.author: N. Lambert-Green

customer_reviews.title: 8 Gun Wood Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I got this item for Father's Day!!! my husband loved it. Thank you so much Amazon... you guys ROCK !!! Silvia
customer_reviews.author: Silvia R. Cantu

customer_reviews.title: Finished Product looked nice
customer_reviews.text: Over all I was well pleased with this item. I was a little concerned with some exterior damage to the shipping box. I found a few dents and scars that wasn't easily visible while unpacking. I called sent Amazon a note with pictures attached and they refunded 10% for damages. The assembly was fairly easily also. It took approximately 1 1/2 to 2 hours. JK
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy K.

product_meta.title: 8 Gun Cabinet
product_meta.description:
This classic 8 gun cabinet features ample space for most 52" scoped rifles and double barrel shotguns. The felt lined barrel rest and butt plate protect your valuables along with the tempered glass in the door. This fully locking cabinet features storage behind the drop front door service at American furniture classics.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This classic 8 gun cabinet features ample space for most 52" scoped rifles and double barrel shotguns. The felt lined barrel rest and butt plate protect your valuables along with the tempered glass in the door. This fully locking cabinet features storage behind the drop front door service at American furniture classics.
feature_bullets: Felt lined barrel rest and butt plate

specifications.Warranty Description: 90 days with parts replaced free of charge
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars70 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
